title: WTB Graded Old Mill Southern Leaguers
author: ins02

posts.post_title: WTB Graded Old Mill Southern Leaguers
posts.post_content: I'm looking to upgrade quite a few of my subset. Looking for anything up to grade 4 or 5 that has no creases or paper loss. Please let me know if you are selling or looking for anything in particular for a trade. Thank you

I have a few SLer's. See scans. I'm including a PSA 3 Tom Guiheen with Old Mill back.....the grade is due to the tobacco stain, otherwise excellent with superb image/registration. Let me know if you're interested.

 [url]timothy_browne@hotmail.com[/url]
